Summary: A large bright light shot across 291 then flashed and disapeared
trends: There have been 52 other sightings in Lee's Summit
There were no other sightings in Lee's Summit on or around November 14th 2011
divs: sighting detailsat the intersection of 291 and langsford road in my car. a large bright light shot across the sky at extreme speed at about the distance of lee's summit high school from where i was at but depth perseption isn't that great at night. i thought it was a plain at first but it was too close to the ground and moving way too fast, so maybe a meteor but i've never seen one that close. the center of the light was an orange glowing ball leaving a long trail of a yellow\white light. then it flashed really bright and disapeared. my friend i was following in my car saw the same thing, definitely one of the coolest things i have ever seen!
Object Shape: Bullet, Missile, Circle, Fireball, Flash, Sphere, Star-like
